page.title: 01PETERHEAD POLICE FORCE
page.content: Peterhead police station was established in 1901.It is a Sub_Divisional office and is quite large in comparison to others in Scotland. { Our local force consists of 3 {policewomen and 45 policemen.There are {6 police cars and 1 police {van.There are 3 traffic wardens and 4 {traffic patrolmen. The most common crime in Peterhead is Breach of the Peace.Most petty crimes are repeated by the same people.But of course there are always new criminals.There are nine cells in the station 3 of which are for women. The policemen and women take it in turns to walk the beat depending on the shift they are working. From what we have seen of Peterhead Police station it is a very efficient and well maintained station.
